thread.title: Beyonce Spills Her Favorite Beyonce Halloween Costume
thread.title_full: Beyonce Spills Her Favorite Beyonce Halloween Costume

title: Beyonce Spills Her Favorite Beyonce Halloween Costume
text:
Beyonce Spills Her Favorite Beyonce Halloween Costume Posted just a moment ago 
Ryan McGinley/Beat Magazine (LOS ANGELES) -- Beyonce represents the American dream on the cover of London-based magazine BEAT , but it's the accompanying interview that has everybody talking. 
During the seemingly random Q&A , Queen Bey reveals which Beyoncé era she'd dress as for Halloween: "Destiny’s Child 'Survivor' era with the army fatigues," she tells the mag. "Or maybe 'Bootylicious' with the gold tooth and pink tips in my hair." 
The diva also opens up about what fear tastes like. "Success. I have accomplished nothing without a little taste of fear in my mouth," she says. 
Beyonce also reveals that in the shower she sings "Holy Ghost" by Kim Burrell, she's down with Netflixl, Fetty Wap’s "Jugg" is stuck in her head and that she puts extra tomato sauce and jalapeños on her pizza. 
The BEAT winter issue, which includes a photo spread shot by Ryan McGinley, will be out October 21.
